ing: 1/2 cup powdered lemonade mix (such as Country TimeÂ®)
des: "This is the best, easiest summer drink EVER!"
ins: Bring the water to a boil in a large pot, and stir in the tea bags, raspberries, and sugar until the sugar has dissolved. Allow the mixture to steep until the desired level of tea flavor is reached, 3 to 5 minutes; remove tea bags, and stir in the lemonade mix until dissolved. Pour tea into pitchers, and add ice to cool.
